Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2013 12:20PM Shellbell431 wrote: Thank you for your reply. Not really sure my ob/gyn said they recommended that I go to see BS and referred me back to him. So waiting for appt. Which is good just not crazy about the guy. He is the best in my area. He did my excisional biopsy back in Sept. I was please with him then. Until my post op. visit. I mentioned this same lump and he said " Oh are you going to be one of those patients?" ..... Wow made me feel stupid. He then went on to tell me " you have fibrositic breast there busy you want me to point out some more lumps!" Not to mention it was in front of my husband who already thinks I'm overreacting. Just left a bad taste in my mouth. ... So to speak.
